page.title: 06Worlingworth shopping survey
page.content: 19 Worlingworth children were asked where their families shopped for specific commodities.Worlingworth Post Office & Garage were very popular.Diss was the popular choice for clothes & Ipswich for household appliances.Furn- iture presented some problems because of the infrequent purchase,Ipswich & mail order had some edge on the other venues.Cooked foods purchase was spread between Eye,Diss,Framlingham & Debenham This probably reflects the popularity off foreign food & the rising cost of Fish & Chips.The indicationsd are that fancy goods are purchased in Ipswich. Included in the survey were 2 American children.This family bought most things from Bentwaters United States Air Force Base. Woodbridge & Norwich play a minor role in providing shopping facilities for Worlingworth people.
